tldr: Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to cross-site scripting on the OpenCode localhost web UI due to unsanitized HTML rendering and a server URL override feature. An attacker can leverage JavaScript execution on `http://localhost:4096` to access the `/pty/` API endpoints and spawn arbitrary processes, resulting in local code execution.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version that falls within the vulnerable range.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `opencode` library to the patch version.
